programme.desc: The VCR Illumination: Sheldon and Amy are still upset about their theory being disproven, but a video tape from Sheldon's past inspires him not to give up.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Paintball Scattering: Jealousy, trust issues and tension among the couples in the gang cause mayhem when Penny and Leonard organise a paintball game.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Dear Beloved Family: Gloria rushes Phil to hospital for emergency surgery when he experiences intense stomach pains.

programme.title: The Neighborhood
programme.desc: Welcome to the Wagon: Dave and Tina discover a common bond when they go to a concert together.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Lake Life: Jay makes the family take their holiday on a houseboat to create memories that will last long after he's gone. And Mitchell runs into an old flame.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: The Long Goodbye: Phil and Claire realise that Alex is more self-sufficient in college than they thought. Manny is determined to avoid a tearful goodbye when he moves to college.

programme.title: Rude(ish) Tube Shorts
programme.desc: A short, cheeky clip featuring animals and food, from the always hilarious Tube that is Rude.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay revisits four restaurants he tried to help: the Spanish Pavillion in New Jersey, and Kingston Caf, La Frite and Capri in California.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: La Galleria 33 (Part 1/2): Gordon tries to help La Galleria 33, run by sisters Rita and Lisa, who blame the restaurant's failures on everything from tablecloths to the weather.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Left Behind: Flanders loses his job and comes to work with Homer at the power plant. Homer prays for him to be fired.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Throw Grampa from the Dane: The Simpsons visit Denmark and all fall in love with it - except Homer. Meanwhile, Grampa needs a serious operation.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Clean Room Infiltration: Amy hosts a Victorian Christmas Eve dinner, complete with party games. Raj, Leonard and Howard have pigeon problems.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Space Probe Disintegration: Howard tries to calm a stressed Raj, who is anxiously awaiting the arrival of some data from a space probe that he helped launch.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: When a Tree Falls: Mitch helps Cam to save an old tree in the park, while Jay and Manny go beyond their comfort zones at a kid's Olympics-themed birthday party.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Diamond in the Rough: When Manny and Luke's little league team unexpectedly makes it into a playoff game, Claire and Cameron scramble to find a location for it.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Novelization Correlation: Amy appears on the Professor Proton show. Penny hates the idea that the female protagonist in Leonard's novel is based on her.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Neonatal Nomenclature: Bernadette's friends try various tactics to help her go into labour.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Athenaeum Allocation: Leonard jumps through hoops to secure the perfect wedding venue for Sheldon and Amy. Howard and Bernadette face a big decision.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Gates Excitation: The guys do everything in their power to meet Bill Gates when his firm has dealings with the pharmaceutical company Penny works for.

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Valloweaster: It's heist time. The squad compete for the title of the greatest human/genius.

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Ransom: Holt asks for Jake's help in a case that's exceptionally meaningful to him. Charles and Terry work together on a side business.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The Dad-Feelings Limited: As Comic Book Guy and his wife Kumiko debate whether to have a baby, his awesome origin story is revealed.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Diary Queen: Bart finds his old teacher's diary and learns a surprising secret. Then Lisa discovers an even bigger surprise.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Propagation Proposition: Penny's ex-boyfriend Zack and his wife want a baby, but when they encounter fertility problems, they ask Leonard for his help.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Confirmation Polarization: Sheldon and Amy are thrilled when their super-asymmetry theory is proved correct. Bernadette enjoys some big success at work.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Meteorite Manifestation: Sheldon is thrilled to help Howard and Bernadette with some bureaucratic paperwork, until he realises that they're breaking the law.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Donation Oscillation: Penny attempts to sabotage Leonard's efforts to help her ex-boyfriend Zack and his wife Marissa have a family of their own.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Rome-Old & Juli-eh: Homer stops paying for Grampa's retirement home, so he has to stay with the family instead. In a twist no one saw coming, Grampa ends up marrying Selma.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homerazzi: Homer becomes a paparazzo to get money to pay for fire damage to the house. But Springfield's celebrities are alarmed by his aggressive style and fight back.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The Musk Who Fell to Earth: Elon Musk turns up in Springfield, befriends Homer and revolutionises the nuclear power plant - which costs Mr Burns dearly...

programme.title: New: Hollyoaks Does Come Dine

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Treehouse of Horror VII: It's Halloween! Settle down for a night of Springfield spookiness. Bart finds his evil twin in the attic, and Lisa becomes God to a race of tiny people.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Treehouse of Horror XVI: The Homer-fied horror continues. Bart is replaced by a well-behaved robot. Homer takes part in a deadly TV show. Lisa turns into Albert Einstein.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Treehouse of Horror XIX: The sinister Simpsons action continues. Homer encounters a murderous rigged voting machine. Lisa's toy car and a vengeful pumpkin get a bit deadly too.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Treehouse of Horror XXII: It's no trick - we're treating you to more scary Simpsons. Homer is paralysed by a spider, and Flanders is transformed into a cold-blooded vigilante.

programme.title: The Simpsons

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Treehouse of Horror XXVIII: Get your head out of the apple bobbing bucket and in front of E4, as the Simpsons become Halloween candy, and Maggie needs an exorcism.

programme.title: Hollyoaks Does Come Dine with Me

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Treehouse of Horror XXXI: The terror-themed trilogy includes the 2020 US election, Pixar and Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse parodies, and Lisa's birthday.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Undercover Burns: Mr Burns goes undercover to see what the employees really think of him, and becomes their friends - to Smithers' alarm...

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Revenge Is a Dish Best Served Three Times: Homer's misguided revenge on Cletus combined with an untimely car breakdown leaves the Simpsons telling tales of revenge gone wrong.

programme.title: The Simpsons

programme.title: Below Deck Sailing Yacht
programme.desc: The Bitter End: The final night out goes as smoothly as you'd expect when things heat up as the crew say their final goodbyes.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: In Your Head: Luke goes missing after a night out. Can Manny, Phil and Gloria find him? Haley tries to land an interview with the creator of a big lifestyle website.

programme.title: The Neighborhood
programme.desc: Welcome to the Vow Renewal: The Johnsons decide to help Calvin and Tina have the wedding they missed out on the first time.

programme.title: The Neighborhood
programme.desc: Welcome to Bowling: Calvin and Dave team up for a chance at bowling championship glory. Gemma and Tina face off.

programme.title: The Neighborhood
programme.desc: Welcome to the Dealbreaker: Gemma sets a reluctant Malcolm up on a blind date with a teacher at her school.

programme.title: The Goldbergs

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: The Rose-Kissy Thing: Beverly encourages Principal Ball to establish a non-athlete Senior Night. Erica struggles to appoint a pre-wedding 'fun captain'.

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: A Light Thanksgiving Nosh: Beverly feels threatened by Linda Schwartz's plan to host Thanksgiving.

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Tennis People: Great news! Adam's accepted into NYU. Terrible news: Brea has a place at a school far away.

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: You Only Die Once, or Twice, But Never Three Times: Barry enlists Adam and his friends to create a James Bond-themed home movie to help him impress Joanne.

programme.title: Made in Chelsea
programme.desc: Brand new series: Beks and Sam Prince get cosy in the Cotswolds, but have they crossed a line? Livvy's torn between Kit and Chuggs. Sam Vanderpump is rocked by life-changing news.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Charlie's: Gordon Ramsay visits Italian bistro Charlie's, where the pasta's soggy, the lasagne's a liability and the chef can't even cook a meatball.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Caf Hon: The Caf Hon restaurant in Baltimore is struggling because its owner has alienated the local community. Can Gordon help?

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Anxiety Optimization: When Sheldon gets stuck in a rut with his research, he asks his friends to cure his mental block by raising his stress levels.

programme.desc: The Troll Manifestation: Leonard and Sheldon co-publish a physics paper but are forced to defend themselves against negative comments from an online critic.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: (2020) Madcap adventure-comedy video game adaptation with Jim Carrey and Ben Schwartz. Can nippy ring-chasing hedgehog Sonic escape the clutches of an evil, moustachioed scientist?

programme.title: The Great New Year Bake Off
programme.desc: 2021 Bake Off finalist Chigs, 2020's Lottie and Manon and 2018's Antony compete to become Star Baker, before seeing the New Year in with a Riverdance performance.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Intimacy Acceleration: When the gang hear about an experiment designed to make participants fall in love, Sheldon and Penny put it to the test as a joke.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Skywalker Incursion: When Leonard and Sheldon are invited to speak at Berkeley, they take a detour during the journey to try to meet one of their idols.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Fortification Implementation: When Sheldon and Amy build a blanket fort, they come to a major crossroads in their relationship. Howard meets his half-brother.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Little Big Girl: Lisa invents fragments of her family's history to impress her classmates, but feels guilty about lying. Bart thinks he's got a girl pregnant by kissing her.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Springfield Up: Famous filmmaker Declan Desmond (voiced by Eric Idle) comes to Springfield to chronicle the lives of its residents for his series Growing Up Springfield.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Yokel Chords: In a parody of The Sound of Music, Lisa tutors Cletus's seven children. But when Krusty spots their singing talent, he snaps them up for his circus.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Rome-Old & Juli-eh: Homer stops paying for Grampa's retirement home, so he has to stay with the family instead. In a twist no one saw coming, Grampa ends up marrying Selma.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homerazzi: Homer becomes a paparazzo to get money to pay for fire damage to the house. But Springfield's celebrities are alarmed by his aggressive style and fight back.

programme.title: Celebrity Gogglebox
programme.desc: The celebs watch Stranger Things, Love Island, Paul Hollywood Eats... Mexico, How to Build a Sex Room, Long Lost Family, Countdown and BBC News (a PM resignation).

programme.title: Gogglebox

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: Britain's sharpest armchair critics watch The Apprentice, Hunted, Corrie, The Underdog: Josh Must Win, Bridge of Lies, and the News on the Princess of Wales' cancer diagnosis.

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: With his cover boy looks and cut-glass accent, Adam comes straight off the slopes at Verbier to meet 'ex-pat brat' Sophie. Can diamond in the rough Kevin charm glamazon Meguel?

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Colin was born with a birth defect that resulted in a missing leg. With a shared sense of humour, he hits it off with phlebotomist Tracey, but will he reveal his disability?

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Communication Deterioration: Raj is asked to create a message for NASA to use if one of their missions finds alien life. Penny considers taking up acting again.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Graduation Transmission: Leonard is invited to make a speech at his old high school. Howard and Sheldon can't make a toy drone fly.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Chiarella's: Gordon Ramsay visits South Philadelphia, where struggling family-run restaurant Chiarella's is pushing owners Tommy and Dina DeFino's marriage to the brink.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay revisits three restaurants to find out if they've continued to follow his advice. How have Down City, Classic American and Davide fared in his absence?

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA

programme.title: Hollyoaks Omnibus
programme.desc: As residents confront the fallout of an explosive week, guilt consumes Donny and tensions rise among the teens. There's an intruder alert at the hospital, and heartbreak in the mortuary.

programme.title: New: Hollyoaks Unwrapped
programme.desc: Brand new series: Nadine Mulkerrin, Anna Passey and Anya Lawrence join Kieron Richardson to unpack all the drama as Hollyoaks celebrates its 30th anniversary. (Ep5)

programme.title: Hollyoaks Does Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Brand new series: To mark 30 years of the iconic soap, five Hollyoaks stars compete for charity. Will McQueen matriarch Nicole Barber-Lane's tropical night be a slice of paradise? (Ep1/5)

programme.title: Hollyoaks Does Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Brand new series: Will Isabelle Smith's guests go crazy for her Mad Hatter's Tea Party? And how can you win the best Soap Newcomer Award again and again? (Ep2/5)

programme.title: Hollyoaks Does Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Brand new series: James Redmond - aka Rory Finnigan - hosts a Scouse-themed night. This isn't his first Come Dine with Me rodeo, but will he break a record and Finn-ish last, again? (Ep3/5)

programme.title: Hollyoaks Does Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Brand new series: Anya Lawrence - aka Vicky Grant - takes her guests to Greece with a mezze of mouthwatering munch and memories, and impresses with a legendary surprise guest! (Ep4/5)

programme.title: Hollyoaks Does Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Brand new series: Charlie Wernham hosts an East End night, in a portable kitchen, on the Hollyoaks set! Let's hope his seafood isn't damp squib! And who's won the week? (Ep5/5)

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: There's patisserie pandemonium as the semi-finalists make cream horns, glass domes and showstopping macarons. Who'll go through to the final? Whose glass dome sends them home?

programme.title: Married at First Sight UK
programme.desc: Brand new series: An unexpected arrival at the retreat leads to a showdown. And as a marital breakdown spirals, everyone's caught in the crossfire at an explosive dinner party.

programme.title: Married at First Sight UK
programme.desc: Brand new series: It's Commitment Ceremony time and some couples reap the rewards from their time away. But for others, turmoil takes hold... is one marriage beyond repair?

programme.title: Married at First Sight UK
programme.desc: Brand new series: It's time for spouse swapping and bed hopping! Absence makes one groom's heart grow especially fonder, but tests one relationship to the brink of destruction.

programme.title: Married at First Sight UK
programme.desc: Brand new series: In the aftermath of partner swaps, the dinner party serves up romantic realisations for some but plummeting problems for others. Is this the end for one couple?

programme.title: Spies in Disguise

programme.title: The Simpsons

programme.title: The Simpsons

programme.title: New: Married at First Sight UK
programme.desc: Brand new series: Time to play happy families as Homestays get underway! Warm welcomes and straight-talking friends await, but a scandal threatens to blow one marriage apart.

programme.desc: Data's Day: Data struggles to comprehend the complex emotional connection between O'Brien and Keiko, who are due to be married. (S4, Ep 11)
